package.name: SpotifyAccountsSwitcher
package.shortDescription: Support any iOS version that Spotify could handle I guess?

descriptionlist.description: Quickly switch between two spotify accounts without logging in and out!

To switch account, simply go to account setting in Spotify and tap LOG OUT.
This package was tested on iOS 11.3.1, 10.3.3 and 8.4.1 with Spotify 8.4.52 installed.
